title: Ticket #4767: Document that missing transfer_output_files file puts job on hold
description: We should document that the non-existence of a file specified in transfer_output_files will result in a job going on hold. Maybe one place to do this would be in "2.5.4.4 Behavior for Error Cases".
remarks:
2015-Jan-13 11:42:53 by smoler:
This detail is already in section 2.5.4.2:

"To restrict the output files or permit entire directory contents to be transferred, specify the exact list with transfer_output_files. Delimit the list of file names, directory names, or paths with commas. When this list is defined, and any of the files or directories do not exist as the job exits, HTCondor considers this an error, and places the job on hold. "
creator: wenger
